DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to estimate Osteoporosis' prevalence in France and is a pilot study in the Department of the Alpes-Maritimes.
DOC.brief_title: Estimation of Osteoporosis' Prevalence in France: Pilot Study in the Department of the Alpes-Maritimes
DOC.criteria: Patient member of Caisse Primaire d'Assurance Maladie Patient incapable of understanding the questionary
